name: UITouch.Phase
desc: The phase of a touch event.

items.name: case began
items.desc: A touch for a given event has pressed down on the screen.

items.name: case moved
items.desc: A touch for a given event has moved over the screen.

items.name: case stationary
items.desc: A touch for a given event is pressed down on the screen, but hasn't moved since the previous event.

items.name: case ended
items.desc: A touch for a given event has lifted from the screen.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The system canceled tracking for a touch, for example, when the user moves the device against their face.

items.name: case regionEntered
items.desc: A touch for a given event has entered a window on the screen.

items.name: case regionMoved
items.desc: A touch for the given event is within a window on the screen, but has not yet pressed down.

items.name: case regionExited
items.desc: A touch for a given event has left a window on the screen.
